attributes.additional_details: Overpaid presenters and producers and a poor scope of entertainment. Sport being a prime example. Perhaps if the BBC began working for their money they might streamline their costs and plough more into actual production, thus competing on a more even keel with companies like Sky and Amazon.
attributes.background: Withdraw public finance for the BBC with immediate effect. It's outdated and no longer viable with the world we now live in. It's time that the BBC raised their own revenue via advertising, marketing and other means like every other modern media house is required to..

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300118
